q: "For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions," Eric Schmidt wrote in a post on Google's Blog, referring to himself, Page, and Sergey Brin . This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. As a result, Page will lead product development and technology strategy within Google and take over Eric Schmidt 's day-to-day role as CEO starting April 4. want the Bill Clinton and Congress to work together on the big issues, not least the economy. Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better. Colin Powell , former secretary of state in the Bush administration who endorsed Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said the Bill Clinton was well positioned politically. . While the music-exec-turned-TV-producer didn't share his specific thoughts about Jennifer Lopez or the oddly entertaining Steven Tyler , he gave them a positive review overall. "I think they're doing fine," Simon Cowell said. You know, they have a different approach to what I used to do before. I think the show had to reinvent itself, and I think it's right that it's a different show( than) what we made before. , but rivals are nipping at its heels. The Chrysler Town and Country was the top-selling minivan in the U.S. last year, with sales of 112,275, or about 4,000 more than the Honda Odyssey. We are not going to give up one inch of territory, Sergio Marchionne said. Chrysler said the 2011 versions of its minivans have a new V-6 engine with improved fuel economy. One amenity is an optional heated steering wheel, a first among minivans. VALETS WANTED

Sergio Marchionne chose the term performance award rather than profit sharing because it's difficult to talk about profit sharing when you have a negative number at the bottom line. The Chrysler news came Monday amid projections that U.S. automobile sales in January may have reached the second-fastest pace in 17 months, aided by rising business spending and consumer confidence. who had a string of 355 passes without being intercepted, received 21 votes from a nationwide panel of 50 media members who regularly cover the league. He easily beat Philadelphia quarterback Michael Vick , who got 11 votes. To me it comes down to the mental toughness and determination of the players and coaches, Tom Brady said. Google has shocked its shareholders by announcing that Eric Schmidt , its current CEO, is to step down in April and co-founder Larry Page will replace him in the chief executive officer role. When I joined Google in 2001 I never imagined, even in my wildest dreams, that we would get as far, as fast as we have today , starts Eric Schmidt in a post on the company's blog, while also posting on Twitter that the move was no longer about needing to supervise founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin : "Day-to-day adult supervision is
